version_description:
It's finally here, Symbolab for iPad! The best way to learn math. Type in any math problem and get instant solution with steps (access to steps require a one time payment)

We also added pre-algebra support including fractions, factors & prime
iPad dIsplay bug fix

* Spanish Support
* Bug Fixes

* "Notebook" makes your notes available on all devices!
* Bug fixes

* Offline notes are here! Access solutions saved to your notebook even when you don't have an internet connection.
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* Offline notes are here! Access solutions saved to your notebook even when you don't have an internet connection.
* Bug fixes and performance improvements

* NEW: Now it's even easier to get the answers you need - solve algebra problems using your camera! More camera-supported topics coming soon.
* Piecewise function support
* Bug fixes and stability improvements

* Camera now supports Calculus problems
* OCR enhancements
* Bug fixes and improvements

* Landscape support on iPhone 6s+/7+, iPad
* Camera now recognizes limits and series problems
* Various bug fixes and improvements

* Landscape support on iPhone 6s+/7+, iPad
* Camera now recognizes limits and series problems
* Various bug fixes and improvements

* Fixed flickering solution refresh
* Fixed keypad size on various platforms
* Improve camera startup speed

* New subjects: Pre-Calc, Geometry, and Statistics, with many new topics all around
* OCR: System of Equations support
* You asked, we listened: added 5xN matrix input keys

* New subjects: Pre-Calc, Geometry, and Statistics, with many new topics all around
* OCR: System of Equations support
* You asked, we listened: added 5xN matrix input keys
